test_cases.user_query: What went wrong with this experiment?
test_cases.expected_content: Analysis of experimental problems including cell type bias, over-digestion, and protocol limitations
expected_insights: Severe immune cell enrichment bias (65% vs expected 35%)
Poor epithelial cell recovery (8% vs expected 30%)
Over-digestion causing cell stress and death
Inadequate mechanical disruption of epithelial clumps

test_cases.user_query: How should we optimize this protocol?
test_cases.expected_content: Protocol optimization recommendations based on identified problems
expected_insights: Cold pre-digestion at 4°C for 15 minutes
Reduce warm digestion time to 20-25 minutes
Enhanced mechanical disruption with additional gentleMACS cycles
Real-time monitoring every 10 minutes
DNase treatment to reduce ambient RNA

optimization_plan: Shortened warm digestion (20-25 min vs 45 min)
